summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 7th Avenue North in the City of Seattle, from Prospect Street to the north line of Union Lake Supplemental Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and wood cross walks thereon, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1291 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
